name: FEELS LIKE A WHEEL
description:
Feels Like A Wheel  is a single player 2.5D city-builder endless-runner. A civilization of hamsters are on the inside of a hamster wheel "world", covered in resources they need to collect to build their hamster villages. Unfortunately for the hamsters, their world is endlessly spinning, with the bottom of the wheel rolling into lava! The ever-encroaching lava forces the hamsters to flee as they collect resources and build endlessly in order to maintain their population and their endlessly destroyed homes.

Game created at TOJam13 Flirteen with Danger under the theme "Winning is for losers" by Mikki Benaglia, Antonio Ilersich, Sebastian Swarney, and Jasper Roth.

Created at TOJam's annual event in 2018, TOJam13 Flirteen with Danger: http://www.tojam.ca/history/2018.asp

Game Submission Link: https://itch.io/jam/tojam13
